about.backendLinkDescription: Dive into the backend code on GitHub.
about.content1-part1: This project, a comprehensive weather forecasting application, was originally developed as part of my thesis at
about.content1-part2: , and is now being further developed as a hobby. The application integrates data from multiple trusted sources to deliver real-time weather updates.
about.content2: The app's frontend is built with Angular, Tailwind CSS, and Ionic, designed to prioritize mobile experiences. An Android app is also in development.
about.content3: On the backend, I'm utilizing Java with Spring Boot. The backend is responsible for fetching and processing weather data from SMHI, YR and FMI. By combining data from these sources, the application ensures a more comprehensive and accurate weather forecast.
about.content4-part1: The Weather images used in the application are sourced from
about.content4-part2: , contributing to the visual appeal and easy interpretation of weather conditions.
about.developmentDisclaimer: The application is currently in development. If you have any questions or feedback, feel free to contact me through the links below. Please note that this website is being developed with a mobile-first approach, so it may not display perfectly on desktop screens at times.
about.frontendLinkDescription: Explore the frontend code on GitHub.
about.title: About
about.translationDisclaimer: The translations have been automatically generated with the help of BabelEdit and google translate so they may contain inaccuracies.

error.title: Error Message
error.services_unavailable: The following services are currently turned off: {{apis}}. Please try again later or choose a different service.
error.service_unavailable: The {{api}} service is currently turned off. Please try again later or choose a different service.
error.one_or_more_services_unavailable: One or more weather services are currently turned off. Please try again later.
error.server_error: Server Error: The server returned an unexpected status code {{status}}. Please try again later.
error.timeout_error: The request took too long to respond. Please check your internet connection or try again later.

error.fmiError: FMI can't be used alone. Please keep at least one other API selected.
